revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netis |model=WF2411 |revision= |asin=B00DYRZBY6;US; |fcc_date=01/13/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=access point,repeater |fcc_id=T58WF2411R |pcb_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed=390 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=CFeon |fla1_model=Q32B-104HIP |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6IH-6 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188RE;RTL8188RE, B4N15R1, GB27; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=guest |default_pass=guest |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|150Mbps Wireless-N AP/Repeater/Router Client}} "PB-790-M02G-10" and "2011-07-14" is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos. :aka 8level WRT-150 SMART ===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a :''DongGuan Supstrong industry'' NQBCD2UL. {{hasPowerSupply |brand=DongGuan Supstrong industry |model=NQBCD2UL |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.2 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=9 |output_a=0.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |manuf_country=China |style=small, horiz. }} ==Serial== ===Pinout=== The serial interface works at 3.3v and can be used as seen in the picture below. :Note that there is no connector soldered on the board. :The connection baud speed is 38400 bps. ===Serial info=== {{SCollapse|Boot log |
=============================

====Bootloader commands==== 
help
------ COMMAND MODE HELP ------
HELP (?)                 : Print this help message
D 
 
DB 
 
DW 
 
EW 
  ...
EB 
  ...
CMP: CMP 
IPCONFIG:
AUTOBURN: 0/1
LOADADDR: 
J: Jump to 
FLW  : 
Write offset-data to SPI from RAM
PHYR: PHYR 
PHYW: PHYW
}} ===Software details=== {{SCollapse|Software and hardware parameters |The software and hardware parameters can be altered with an included command called flash. :Running it shows the following output 
# flash    
Usage: flash cmd
option:
cmd:
      default -- write flash parameters to default.
      get [wlan interface-index] mib-name -- get a specific mib from flash
          memory.
      set [wlan interface-index] mib-name mib-value -- set a specific mib into
          flash memory.
      all -- dump all flash parameters.
      gethw hw-mib-name -- get a specific mib from flash
          memory.
      sethw hw-mib-name mib-value -- set a specific mib into
          flash memory.
      allhw -- dump all hw flash parameters.
      reset -- reset current setting to default.
      set_mib -- get mib from flash and set to wlan interface.
      param import|export filename -- import or export flash parameters.
*For example, issuing the following command will change :the MAC address of NIC0 to 123456789123: 
flash sethw HW_NIC0_ADDR 123456789123
}} ==Images== Image:Netis WF2411.jpg|Router Image:WF2411_top.JPG|Top case detail Image:wf2411_bottom.JPG|Bottom case detail File:WF2411_Serial_Interface.jpg|Serial interface [[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]] __NOTOC__
